match.statusText: Zimbabwe won by 7 wickets (with 41 balls remaining)

notes: The 64-run partnership for the 7th wicket was a record for Bangladesh

milestones.description: Akram Khan and Mushfiqur Rahman's 64-run partnership is BAN's highest for the 7th wicket in ODIs, breaking the record of 48 between Aminul Islam and Enamul Haque
This is the lowest match aggregate (306) involving teams Zimbabwe & Bangladesh in ODIs

stories.title: Comfortable victory for Zimbabwe over Bangladesh in first One-Day International
stories.summary:
On a beautiful sunny morning at Harare Sports Club, Bangladesh unwittingly
signed their own death warrant by deciding to bat against Zimbabwe

image.longCaption: Shane Warne bowls the first Test match ball under lights. Australia v New Zealand 2nd Test, Day One, at the WACA, Perth, Thursday November 20th 1997

25.title: Tour Match
25.statusText: Bangladeshis won by 7 wickets (with 106 balls remaining)
